subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Padraig Harrington, an Irishman who turns 41 next week, shot a seven-under-par 64 for a one-stroke lead at the Barclays, despite the attention focused on Tiger Woods and Rory McIlory.
snippet: Padraig Harrington, an Irishman who turns 41 next week, shot a seven-under-par 64 for a one-stroke lead at the Barclays, despite the attention focused on Tiger Woods and Rory McIlory.
